Recent Customer Reviews

sawebmaster said:
Hi guys

I have been using Skynethosting for several months now and everything is running smoothly. They are very friendly specially on live chat which is avilable 24/7

Sometime back I was unable to pay the bills for few weeks as my clients didnt pay in time and there live chat staff was kind enough to extend my billing date by 2 weeks

I would recommend them if you are looking for reseller plans
Click to expand...

chilli said:
I have been with them since Oct 2019 and they have been pretty good. Better than my last host. Customer service is good, features are good. Had a few glitches but no more so than with anyone else and they were sorted quickly. Very glad I made the move and can definitely recommend them.
Click to expand...

ahmadmukhtar said:
I've been with SkyNetHosting since February, 2015 and I would like to say that out of every web hosting service I tried, SkyNetHosting has been a great one.

Support:
*If I talk about the help desk tickets, Billing and sales department are a bit slow in responding while Technical department is fast and they responded almost every time to my tickets in about 30 minutes or so.
*Live support is great in all the departments especially the technical department is quick in solving problems except sometimes a certain staff member (not saying name) is online but doesn't reply for so long

Pricing:
I think of all the reseller hosting providers available they have the most affordable plans for a reseller or I might have missed some other better ones but the ones I looked at, I found SkyNetHosting the best.

Uptime:
The uptime is great too, only the month of June 2016, and May 2016 i think was a bit bad as the uptime for that month went down than guaranteed but that was covered by the SLA and I was compensated for that downtime.

Domain pricing for the domain reseller however went high recently which is higher than other domain resellers.

Overall the experience with them has been great up till now and I hope it stays the same in future. Kudos to SkyNetHosting
Click to expand...

Paradis eHost said:
SkyNetHosting. Their prices are unbelievable and their support is top notch
Click to expand...

FourtyThree said:
I've also had a bit to do with SkyNetHosting.
* The time difference between myself and them makes for interesting, but generally good ticket times (not their fault) - Their response to my tickets has been clear & concise.
* I have made several mistakes, which they have quickly fixed each time, without question.
* Pricing is great.
* No idea as to uptime & speed at this stage.
Click to expand...

calvynlee said:
I been a year with SNH and at this moment still a happy customer..
Click to expand...

Nunim said:
I've been with them for about a month now and so far I'm very happy. They have powerful non overloaded servers and decent support times. I haven't experienced any noticable downtime as of yet but it's still early.
Click to expand...

calvynlee said:
I been a year with SNH and at this moment still a happy customer.
Click to expand...

m1ntie said:
I recently posted a thread entitled "hosting novice needs advice" and subsequently decided on a reseller account for the extra bandwidth and disc space - not to resell.

After looking at the many excellent hosting deals promoted on this site I finally decided to go with SkyNetHosting and I am so glad I did.

Although my site is still under construction and has not been uploaded to my SkyNetHosting server yet, the support I have received so far has been first class.

I had some difficulty in changing my DNS and Jessica even did it for me, since then they have answered many queries that I had and always dealt with them promptly. I hope the excellent service continues once my site is up and running.

In the meantime well done Jessica and SkyNetHosting. It is good to see a company living up to its promises of good service.
Click to expand...

wonderland said:
Yesterday, I got one of the best DL speeds from you guys. Any chance you plan to have a promotion in the next few weeks
Click to expand...
